dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly and honestly show their emotions, taking risks to maintain genuine connections.
Your FarTwin will carefully control their emotional expression, prioritizing self-protection and reserve.

dimensions.label: Intellectual Curiosity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new experiences?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly explore and learn from new experiences, often taking on challenges to expand their knowledge.
Your FarTwin will approach new experiences with a critical eye, weighing the risks and benefits before committing to exploration.

dimensions.label: Career Ambition
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin pursue career goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will aggressively pursue their career aspirations, taking calculated risks to achieve success.
Your FarTwin will focus on long-term stability and security in their career, prioritizing steady growth over flashy advancement.

dimensions.label: Home Life Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize personal space?

options.description: Your FarTwin will value their independence and alone time, actively seeking out opportunities to recharge.
Your FarTwin will prioritize building strong relationships with family and friends, prioritizing connection over solitude.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage in social interactions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will jump into social situations with enthusiasm, often taking the lead to create memorable experiences.
Your FarTwin will approach social interactions with a clear plan and strategy, carefully selecting opportunities to build relationships.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take bold risks to achieve their goals, often embracing uncertainty as an opportunity for growth.
Your FarTwin will approach uncertainty with a cautious mindset, carefully weighing the pros and cons before making decisions.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely and openly express themselves creatively, often taking risks to explore new ideas.
Your FarTwin will approach creative expression with a systematic and methodical approach, carefully planning and refining their work.

dimensions.label: Collaborative Mindset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach group projects?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize understanding and empathy in group work, actively listening to others' perspectives.
Your FarTwin will approach group projects with a competitive mindset, prioritizing their own contributions and goals.
